title: Starship gets close, but scrubs for maiden launch attempt
summary: The world’s most powerful rocket in history will have to wait a few more days for its first launch attempt, the first major step to making life multi-planetary. Liftoff of Starship from Starbase, Texas was set to occur within a 2.5-hour window that opened at 07:00 CDT.
